actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 107-642.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 107-254.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 571.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the French Colonial Heritage Area in the State of Missouri as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
short_title: French Colonial Heritage Area Study Act of 2001

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to specified congressional committees regarding the suitability and feasibility of designating the French Colonial Historic District, including the Bequette-Ribault, St Gemme-Amoureaux, and Wilhauk homes and related supporting historical assets in Ste. Genevieve County, Missouri, as a unit of the National Park System.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: French Colonial Heritage Area Study Act of 2001

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the French Colonial Heritage Area in the State of Missouri as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
